title: When you are another year older and you realize you have succeeded at nothing in the last year
body:
But you *did* gain about 75k upvotes on a moderately sized video game forum during that time.
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Cw7dtzBWEAEnv31.jpg:large

replies.body: And won a small war on the moderately sized video game forum. And became a ship on the moderately sized video game forum. And started a discord for the people on the moderately sized video game forum. Etc.

This is true. I may be failing at everything else, but when it comes to moderately sized video game forums I am the king!
https://rationalityofaith.files.wordpress.com/2016/04/tumblr_inline_mpm3rtwdur1qz4rgp.gif?w=547
~~For now~~ I mean, what? Yeah, totally, man!
http://24.media.tumblr.com/65cdf9235d1361260cd8a620d0d46508/tumblr_mjwyl8s1UV1s0m6axo1_400.gif

Don't worry.

https://justiceforkristen.files.wordpress.com/2012/10/paparazzi.jpg

I'm used to the attention.
http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/SLJ.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/c5FhF1waAJ5wk/giphy.gif
https://m.popkey.co/553c80/0eAmW_f-maxage-0.gif

Everyone be like "Make way for the king!"
http://bestanimations.com/Animals/Fish/oceanfish/school-of-fish-underwater-ocean-amazing-animated-gif-picture-6.gif
http://i.imgur.com/Xf6BseK.gif?Noredirect
What war are you talking about?

The Second Meme War, where Airman Compsci and her concubine, King Odarth, rose up and challenged Laughing Fish's rule with their followers. 'Twas a war most tragic, with downvote trolls raging throughout the Boards, and unfulfilled promises of cookies on both sides...

'Twas a most violent war indeed. But while I was not unscathed, I recovered from my wounds and returned danker than ever. And slowly the rebellious Queen did fade into oblivion.

And as with every uprising before, I remained King.
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3Fxg2Qyw54I/VdidUxOioUI/AAAAAAAAAhQ/stScow-VnPQ/s1600/tumblr_static_tumblr_m7oyk045371rawb5do1_500.gif

To be fair you only won because he got banned.

It wasn't that you won it was that he lost
https://i.giphy.com/3oz8xLd9DJq2l2VFtu.gif

Huh, I saw that war.

I was wondering where King Odarth and Airman ended up.

Was that before or after LF's self imposed exile? I forget the exact order of events.

Neither one got banned. Basically, order of events:

1: shit got real
2: I left
3: Shit ceased to be so real
4: I came back
5: Airman left

\ 6. Laughing Fish got bored because M&G wasn't real enough, so he visited GD for a time. 

\ 7. Laughing Fish got banned because GD couldn't handle him.

\ 8. Laughing Fish came back to M&G.
This is true. GD is a dark and terrible place void of all dankness. It is better to stay in Memes and Games.

Ah. That helps. 

Whatever happened to King Odarth?
He wasn't really that involved. He was already bored of the boards and had mostly stopped posting.

Let me fix that for you.

> And as with every uprising before, my army of minions on a tomato cart trollvoted down anyone who opposed us. And so, i remained the Justin Bieber of the Boards whose ego shines so bright that even God Fist Lee Sin couldn't deny my self-proclaimed "rule". But fear not, my glutton of attention will only be sated once i get off Memes & Games and my family starts talking to me again. Until then, the re - posting continues.
how come this isn't downvoted to the gutter?
https://img.memesuper.com/ebf67135a9c61a25dbbd7f11c859fd60_deal-with-it-eel-with-it-meme_607-463.jpeg
So another low-key "praise me" thread. Why am i not surprised?

This was low-key?

http://i.imgur.com/QfMce28.gif?Noredirect
Oh right, you just reminded me that your ego wouldn't allow the word "low" to be used in association. So yes, i guess it's even more blatant.
https://i.giphy.com/AeWoyE3ZT90YM.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/dC9DTdqPmRnlS/giphy.gif
Why are you so angry? You do know that you can block his threads, right?
I'm not angry. It's just something to put him in his place despite the fanatical cult keeping him under protection with downvoting and replies in his stead as if that removes credibility.

Clearly it didn't work because he's being a good sport about it.

Also you clearly don't understand that any "cult" he has quickly abandons him the second he steps in gameplay, general discussion, or outside the house.
On the contrary, I follow King Fish wherever he goes.
How exactly did you "put him in his place" lmfao?
So does that mean it's your birthday today?

Indeed it does. 
https://www.90daykorean.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/The-Wooly-Mamba-psy-dance.gif
http://dl.glitter-graphics.com/pub/3147/3147496l94sktajqc.gif
http://bestanimations.com/Holidays/Birthday/funny-big-bang-theory-happy-birthday-to-me-animated-gif.gif
http://i.imgur.com/tN19lWj.jpg we are here to sing thy song that is used when ones date of birth comes around, and after thou song we shall bring thy a cake

The song that goes like this?

"Happy Biiiirthdaaaaaay. 
Happy Biiiirthdaaaaaay. 

One year closer to your grave - think of all the food well save.

Happy Biiiirthdaaaaaay. 
Happy Biiiirthdaaaaaay."

Ah fish, the man who inspired me to spread the cheesy league humor through memes and games, I remember when I was a simple gif guy like you, but thanks to your guidance I have blossomed into a cheesy guy who can be both ham and a little crackers, providing a delicious bad joke snack. ~~Nailed it~~ http://memecrunch.com/meme/DZRJ/thank-you-sensei/image.jpg
http://onwardstate.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/conan-bowing.gif

Its ok mate XD I've been working mostly independent at home now and my money is pretty crap but acceptable.

I left my job after losing my mind and its been one of my best decisions.

I stopped taking things so seriously even video games (except when i want to 100% them like Breath of the Wild right now)

You're one of the coolest gamers I've met even though its on forums Your all about the comedy and no serious BS thats what we love you so much about. We need more people like you.

https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/z/take-easy-19594828.jpg
https://img-s2.onedio.com/id-579dbdffd9a4fb7618dd86ad/rev-0/w-500/s-411606aab680a655a7745eb446a5f5ec969128db.gif

https://m.popkey.co/d86114/qxy0g.gif

had to edit this post.
